modName: Astaroth the Death Hound Follower - DELETED
descriptionHtml:
Made by request! Thanks for the idea DoomxShadow !

[b]Here is all you need to know:
[/b]
Name: Astaroth (Pretty badass hm?)
HP: 100 (increase with level)
Damage: 12 (Have Frost cloak)
Levels with you from 1 to 255
Not overpowered 
Doesn't affect stealth meter
Carry Items
Look Cool
Wait for you in [color=#ff0000]North Shriekwind Bastion[/color] (near the Standing stones)
[b]
[/b][b]Requirements [/b]
Skyrim 1.9
Dawguard 

[b]Bugs[/b]
If Astaroth does not Appear, change the load order 
For some reason if he not respond to your commands
Save and Reload 

[b]Recomended mod:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54045/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D54045&pUp=1]New Death Hound sounds [/url] < MUST HAVE

[b]Check my other mods![/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5547206/?tb=mods&pUp=1]List of my mods Click Here! [/url]<

Enjoy and [color=#e69138][b][u]Endorse[/u][/b][/color] !
author: Ramonfg95
